com.camerontec.catalys.core.session.scp

Class ScpSupportHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.core.session.scp.ScpSupportHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScpSupportVersion11Level1
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScpVersion11Level1Handler, ScpVersion11Level2Handler

    public abstract class ScpSupportHandler
extends Object
implements IScpSupportVersion11Level1
    The SCP object is the intermediary between the Session object and the ScpInboundContext and ScpOutboundContext objects. It provides methods to process incoming SCP messages, wrappers to send outgoing SCP messages and methods to create SCP alerts. It also maintain the SCP state and tracks the sending and the reception of SCP hello
    Author:
    mmattini

        public abstract boolean processScp(IFIXMessage mess)
                            throws ScpException
        Process SCP message
        Parameters:
        mess - SCP message internally represented as a custom FIX message
        Returns:
        true if severity is fatal => session is to be closed
        Throws:
        ScpException - TBD
